thread.title: Debutant Gideon Baah departs to join Black Stars team in Washington ahead of Canada friendly
thread.title_full: Debutant Gideon Baah departs to join Black Stars team in Washington ahead of Canada friendly

title: Debutant Gideon Baah departs to join Black Stars team in Washington ahead of Canada friendly
text:
13:40 CET Debutant Gideon Baah departs to join Black Stars team in Washington ahead of Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Gideon Baah leaves to join Ghana camp for the first time 
Defender Gideon Baah has boarded a flight from his base in Finland to join up with the Black Stars team in Washington, GHANAsoccernet.com can confirm. 
The 24-year-old left his base in Helsinki on Friday morning and is expected to arrive in the Black Stars camp in Washington later in the evening. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
